      • reportAbuse

        public String reportAbuse(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event)
        reportAbuse Flag a comment as abusive. Sends an email to the admin. Sets the rendered attribute to false and sets the "Flagged for abuse" output text on.
        Parameters:
        event -
        Returns:
        string indicating sucess or failure - used in navigation.
